alert.note: Alert for Huntingdon (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 2:49PM EST until January 11 at 1:00AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Pennsylvania... Aughwick Creek at Shirleysburg affecting Huntingdon County. For the Aughwick Creek...including Shirleysburg...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Aughwick Creek at Shirleysburg. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Aughwick Creek at Shirleysburg exceeds its banks. Several homes are affected. At 12.0 feet, Flood waters from Aughwick Creek cover portions of Gilbo Road, Aughwick Mills Road and Keystone Road in Shirley Township. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 10.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:30 PM EST Wednesday was 11.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 8.5 feet early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning.
